# Getting Started

Go to https://storymaps.arcgis.com/ 

Click on the **Sign In** icon on the top right corner to sign in or create a free account
![Step1 - Log in](https://github.com/Data-Cat/StoryMaps/blob/master/Step1.png)

Log in using your @UNLV Google account
![Step1a - Log in](https://github.com/Data-Cat/StoryMaps/blob/master/Step1a.png)

Scroll down a little bit until you reach a new section with the option “CREATE STORY”
![Step1b - Create Story](https://github.com/Data-Cat/StoryMaps/blob/master/Step1b.png)

Select **MAP JOURNAL**
![Step1c - Select MAP JOURNAL](https://github.com/Data-Cat/StoryMaps/blob/master/Step1c.png)

Select **SIDE PANEL** and click **START**
![Step1dc - Side Panel](https://github.com/Data-Cat/StoryMaps/blob/master/Step1d.png)
